name: Ove Glove Anti-Steam Oven Mitt - As Seen On TV-ANTISTEAM RGHT OVE GLOVE
categoryPath: Home/Kitchen & Dining/Cookware, Bakeware & Tools/Kitchen Tools & Gadgets

reviews.name: As Seen on TV The Anti-Steam 'Ove' Glove, Right Hand
reviews.reviewText: I have had numerous "Ove" Gloves over the years and this one is the best by far. It now protects against steam. I truly believe in this product and every household or even business should have one. The uses are endless.
reviews.title: Never hurt yourself again

reviews.name: As Seen on TV The Anti-Steam 'Ove' Glove, Right Hand
reviews.reviewText: Great item they also need to make a left hand glove. I do have the regular Ove Glove and you can use it on both left and right hand.
reviews.title: Great item ! No more hot hands !

reviews.name: As Seen on TV The Anti-Steam 'Ove' Glove, Right Hand
reviews.reviewText: I wish it was a little bigger, I Have bigger hands.
reviews.title: IT IS OK

reviews.name: As Seen on TV The Anti-Steam 'Ove' Glove, Right Hand
reviews.reviewText: These gloves are great! They definitely protect you from high heat when removing pans from the oven. Much better than regular pot holders. Would absolutely recommend them.
reviews.title: Excellent product! Very effective!

reviews.name: As Seen on TV The Anti-Steam 'Ove' Glove, Right Hand
reviews.reviewText: This product works great. It has met all my expectations.
reviews.title: The OveGlove with steam protection
